During the call, Sergey Brin expressed what sounded like genuine admiration for Eric Schmidt 's role in Google's success. We're all in great debt to Eric Schmidt , said Sergey Brin .`` There's really no one else in the universe who could have done what Eric Schmidt has done.'' shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.
